gml:Dictionary.gml:description: The type of a bibliographic reference citation for a location instance in a gazetteer.
gml:Dictionary.gml:name: DoD/IC Dictionary: GSIP Geographic Identifier Bibliographic Reference Citation Type Code Dictionary

gml:Definition.gml:description: A collection of data records intended for computer processing.
gml:Definition.gml:name: Dataset

gml:Definition.gml:description: A formal meeting in which one or more persons question, consult, or evaluate another person.
gml:Definition.gml:name: Interview

gml:Definition.gml:description: A representation of the features of an area of the Earth that portrays them in their respective forms, sizes, and relationships according to some convention of representation on a flat surface.
gml:Definition.gml:name: Map

gml:Definition.gml:description: A book or other written or printed work.
gml:Definition.gml:name: Text

gml:Definition.gml:description: A connected group of pages on the World Wide Web regarded as a single entity, usually maintained by one person or organization and devoted to a single topic or several closely related topics.
gml:Definition.gml:name: Website
